description: {"blocks":[{"key":"isid","text":"Induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC)-derived neurons are an important tool for studying diverse types of neurodegenerative disorders, including Alzheimer’s Disease, Parkinson’s disease, and related dementias. Understanding the molecular and cellular mechanisms associated with these diseases is an important step in developing new therapeutic targets. Here we describe a robust differentiation protocol in which we expressed the human neurogenin 2 (NGN2) transcription factor under a tetracycline-inducible promoter as previously described (Fernandopulle et al. 2018), with several modifications and using a PiggyBac system for delivery. This differentiation protocol yields high percentages of cortical neuron markers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":180,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":196,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":201,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ebv38","text":" {"blocks":[{"key":"fialg","text":"Prepare Induction Medium and place in   water or bead bath to warm during dissociation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6g5cu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a22vf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B83C3D90336211EC81CD8DFA9EE317DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96kk1","text":"Observe iPSCs under a phase contrast microscope to assess confluency and presence of cells debris. Dish should be dissociated at ~70% to 80% confluency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nj7m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bp9qo","text":"Aspirate culture medium and wash with PBS 1X.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8l326","text":"Aspirate PBS and add half of culture volume of Accutase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27uqb","text":"Transfer to    incubator for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"p4b8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag3fv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e352r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etpf8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BB35B200336311EC81CD8DFA9EE317DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"C6BFA4F0336311EC81CD8DFA9EE317DD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":168,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"a01ko","text":"The time can vary by cell line and density (the optimal density is 70-80% and time can go up to 20 minutes) and the goal to use accutase is singularize as single cells.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0tju","text":"When Incubation is ready, tilt the plate and pipet the accutase solution two to three times up and down to singularize as single cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qt3k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0hba","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81m76","text":"Quench the Accutase adding half of the culture volume of PBS.  Transfer to a new conical tube and rinse with more PBS the culture surface, combine with the cell solution in the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lejl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b87ii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42ck8","text":"Centrifuge    at 200 - 300 x g at    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1qbkv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uhur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e0ns","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9qr5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ejrde","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"56AF7BD0336411EC81CD8DFA9EE317DD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"67462840336411EC81CD8DFA9EE317DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":82,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"27jrd","text":"While centrifuge, aspirate Matrigel solution from plates and add Induction Medium.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3ap3","text":"Aspirate supernatant and resuspend cell pellet with Induction Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a430b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4srfq","text":"Count cells, Gently transfer 25,000  iPSCs per cm2 (i.e. For a 6 well plate, seed ~2.5 x 105 cells/well).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":36,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":49,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":91,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3alph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"139d9","text":"Gently rock plate to evenly distribute cells and leave it at   for   to let the cells settle down then place in   incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"85j22","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4E552D009AF611ECBE05C107108A6E09","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"5EA50C709AF611ECBE05C107108A6E09","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"706DD650336611EC81CD8DFA9EE317DD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7rso","text":"Day 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5odc","text":"Check cells under the microscope, nascent neuritic extensions should begin to be evident after 24 h of doxyxycline exposure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ud2n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Neurites should be obvious by this time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7k4gf","text":"Prepare fresh Neuronal Maturation Medium for day 4 as referred above. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"em0m9","text":"After dissociating cells with Accutase as step 2.4 to 2.9 resuspend cell pellet with Neuronal Maturation Medium for day 4 and count.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88ge8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1543e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lkq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fc49a","text":"Plate 1.5 x 106 pre-differentiated neurons onto a PLO-coated 6 well with    of Neuronal Maturation Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":14,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":79,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4lus2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3rre","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24hk0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"3-4","error":false,"guid":"B6B8DC10358A11EC902D374BC91E18E5","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":118,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"5ip4r","text":"The number of pre-differentiated neurons to be re-plated varies depending of the final assay but it can be as follows:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":62,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"9lpt7","text":"384 well plate (imaging) 7,000 to 9,000 in 100 µL medium/well.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":54,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":1,"offset":29,"style":"sup"}],"key":"5q1b4","text":"96 well plate (imaging) 4x 104 in  300 µL medium/well.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":60,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":2,"offset":34,"style":"sup"}],"key":"c04fv","text":"12 well plate (Biochemistry) 7x 105  in 2 mL medium/well.   ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":58,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":1,"offset":37,"style":"sup"}],"key":"405ds","text":"6 well plate (Biochemistry) 1.5 x  106 in 4 mL medium/well","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":41,"offset":0,"style":"italic"},{"length":2,"offset":18,"style":"sup"}],"key":"dbvvr","text":"10 cm dish 8  x 106  in 10- 12 mL medium.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"557f","text":"After day 4 do half of the medium change every  3-4 days with Neuronal Maturation Medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cno9n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9b3b1","text":"Gently rock plate to evenly distribute cells and leave it at   for   to let the cells settle down then place in   incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DD723B0F9AF611ECBB2C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DD723C479AF611ECBB2C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DD723DEB9AF611ECBB2C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
